data.title: Premier Boat Repair & Service in CT
data.meta_description: Exceptional boat repair and maintenance services at Boats Inc: Industry-leading expertise for over 60 years. Contact us today to experience top-tier service in Connecticut.
data.text:
To maintain your boat’s good condition, you require a reliable source of information and expertise. This will ensure its longevity.

Boats Inc. has been fixing boats and YAMAHA engines for over 60 years. They aim to help you maximize the benefits of your investment. At Boats Inc., we share your love for boating and understand that your priority is getting out on the water.

Whether you purchased your boat from us or not, you’ve come to the right place for trusted boat and YAMAHA repair services. Our Service Department has skilled YAMAHA technicians, making us a trusted boat maintenance and repair facility in the Northeast. If you have any questions about our repair services, please don’t hesitate to contact us at (860) 739-5444. If you require a quote for a specific service, simply fill out our Service Quote Request, and we’ll respond promptly.

Our Service Department has a team of seven Certified YAMAHA Technicians. This team includes a YAMAHA Master Technician, two Service Advisors, two Riggers, four Yard Assistants, and one Detailer. Our Service Department remains open every day of the week, including Sundays when other facilities are closed.

Come visit Boats Inc.’s Service Department to witness why it holds the reputation of being one of the best in the industry. Our recipe for success is simple – Do the Job Right, for the Price Quoted, and On Time.

Have Questions or Would Like to Make an Appointment?

Call or E-mail Us at Any Time!

Our Boat Services

Electrical Repair:

Our experts provide electrical repair and installation services, including battery replacement, ensuring your boat’s electrical systems function flawlessly.

Boat Motor Repair & Service:

Our technicians specialize in repairing YAMAHA outboards. We can help with simple tasks like changing oil and preparing for winter. We can also assist with more complicated repairs such as replacing engines. Our experience and equipment ensure effective diagnosis and repair of your engine.

Boat Parts & Accessories:

We are a trusted boat dealer in Connecticut with a wide range of boat parts and accessories available. We stock a wide range of YAMAHA parts. We are also committed to offering competitive prices and price matching to ensure you get the best deal.

We proudly serve customers from various areas in Connecticut, Rhode Island and all of New England, including East Lyme, Waterford, Lyme, Old Saybrook, Essex, Westbrook, Clinton, Madison, Branford, New Haven, New London, Groton, Mystic and Stonington, CT.

At Boats Inc. in Niantic, CT, we want to make sure your boating experience is great. We’re here to help with all your boat service, parts, and repair needs.
